name: The Green Job Bank
tag_list: jobs, careers, green-jobs, cleantech, renewable-energy, sustainable-energy, climate-change, environment
overview:
TheGreenJobBank.com is the US #1 Green Jobs Search Website. TheGreenJobBank’s crawlers index Green jobs from thousands of Green employers websites, Green job boards and general job boards.

The Green Job Bank features over 10,000 green jobs, hundreds of Green employer profiles, and dozens of Green Education Programs. Job seekers have all of the resources they need in one place to find a job and research the Green companies for which they want to work.

milestones.description: Announces the release of a new feature on the site: the detection of duplicate job postings.
milestones.source_description: The Green Job Bank Releases New Search Technology that Detects Duplicate Job Postings

milestones.description: With 10,000 unique green job postings, The Green Job Bank is the most comprehensive search engine for careers in the rapidly growing green economy
milestones.source_description: The Green Job Bank Tops 10,000 Green Jobs

milestones.description: The Green Job Search Engine will track and publish monthly reports about the green jobs created by the 10 winners of the GE Ecomagination Challenge.
milestones.source_description: The Green Job Bank to Track Job Creation by GE Ecomagination Challenge Winners

milestones.description: TheGreenJobBank ranks USA's #1 Green Jobs Website
milestones.source_description: TheGreenJobBank Ranked USA's #1 Green Jobs Website

milestones.description: Google Upgrades TheGreenJobBank from pagerank4 to pagerank 5
milestones.source_description: Google Upgrades TheGreenJobBank from PageRank 4 to PageRank 5

milestones.description: TheGreenJobBank listed as one of the "top 10 major job sites" by MSN Money
milestones.source_description: 25 websites to help you get a job
